com.glavsoft.viewer.swing

Class SwingViewerWindowFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glavsoft.viewer.swing.SwingViewerWindowFactory

  • public class SwingViewerWindowFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory that creates SwingViewerWindow with a number of params

      • SwingViewerWindowFactory

        public SwingViewerWindowFactory(boolean isSeparateFrame,
                                ViewerEventsListener viewerEventsListener)
        Construct factory for creating SwingViewerWindow
        Parameters:
        isSeparateFrame - if true, creates at the separate frame, else use external container
        viewerEventsListener - the listener for closing app events
        See Also:
        and put viewer window into the container

    • Method Detail

      • createViewerWindow

        public SwingViewerWindow createViewerWindow(Protocol workingProtocol,
                                            ProtocolSettings rfbSettings,
                                            UiSettings uiSettings,
                                            java.lang.String connectionString,
                                            ConnectionPresenter presenter)
        Creates SwingViewerWindow
        Parameters:
        workingProtocol - Protocol object, represents network session that is 'connected' to remote host
        rfbSettings - rfb protocol settings currently used at the session
        uiSettings - gui settings currently used to for displaying viewer window
        connectionString - used to show window title string for displaying remote host name
        presenter - ConnectionPresenter that response for reconnection and connection history manipulation
        Returns:
        the SwingViewerWindow
        See Also:
        SwingViewerWindow
